streams.name: Science
streams.description: Explore careers in medicine, engineering, research, and technology

courses.name: B.Tech Computer Science
courses.description: Learn programming, software development, artificial intelligence, and data science. Build apps, websites, and cutting-edge technology solutions.

courses.name: B.Tech Civil Engineering
courses.description: Design and construct buildings, bridges, roads, and infrastructure. Shape the physical world around us.

courses.name: B.Tech Electronics & Communication
courses.description: Work with electronic devices, communication systems, and embedded technology. From smartphones to satellites.

courses.name: MBBS (Bachelor of Medicine)
courses.description: Become a medical doctor. Diagnose illnesses, treat patients, and save lives. The most respected healthcare profession.

courses.name: BDS (Bachelor of Dental Surgery)
courses.description: Specialize in dental health, oral surgery, and cosmetic dentistry. Help people maintain healthy smiles.

courses.name: B.Pharm (Bachelor of Pharmacy)
courses.description: Study medicines, drug development, and pharmaceutical sciences. Contribute to healthcare through medication.

courses.name: B.Sc Nursing
courses.description: Provide patient care, assist doctors, and make a difference in healthcare. A noble and rewarding profession.

courses.name: B.Sc Physics
courses.description: Understand the fundamental laws of the universe. Study mechanics, quantum physics, and relativity.

streams.name: Commerce
streams.description: Explore careers in business, finance, accounting, and management

courses.name: B.Com (Bachelor of Commerce)
courses.description: Foundation in accounting, taxation, and business. Opens doors to finance and business careers.

courses.name: BBA (Bachelor of Business Administration)
courses.description: Learn management, marketing, and business strategy. Prepare for leadership roles in companies.

courses.name: Chartered Accountancy (CA)
courses.description: Become a financial expert. Handle auditing, taxation, and financial planning for businesses.

courses.name: BBA in Finance
courses.description: Specialize in investment, banking, and financial markets. Learn to manage money and investments.

courses.name: B.A/B.Sc Economics
courses.description: Study markets, policies, and economic systems. Understand how money and resources flow in society.

streams.name: Arts & Humanities
streams.description: Explore careers in law, media, design, psychology, and social sciences

courses.name: B.A Psychology
courses.description: Understand human behavior, emotions, and mental health. Help people overcome challenges.

courses.name: LLB / BA LLB (Law)
courses.description: Study law, justice, and legal systems. Argue cases and protect people's rights.

courses.name: BJMC (Journalism & Mass Communication)
courses.description: Learn reporting, media production, and digital communication. Tell stories that matter.

courses.name: B.Des (Bachelor of Design)
courses.description: Create visual designs, user interfaces, and brand identities. Combine creativity with technology.
courses.eligibility: 12th in any stream + Design aptitude test

courses.name: BFA (Bachelor of Fine Arts)
courses.description: Express yourself through painting, sculpture, and visual arts. Become a professional artist.

courses.name: B.A English Literature
courses.description: Study great works of literature, language, and creative writing. Develop strong communication skills.

streams.name: Vocational & Skill-Based
streams.description: Practical courses for quick employment in specialized fields

courses.name: Hotel Management
courses.description: Learn hospitality, food service, and hotel operations. Work in top hotels and resorts worldwide.

courses.name: B.Sc Animation & VFX
courses.description: Create animated films, visual effects, and digital content. Work in movies and gaming.

courses.name: Fashion Design
courses.description: Design clothing, accessories, and fashion products. Shape trends and styles.

courses.name: Aviation & Cabin Crew Training
courses.description: Work as cabin crew, ground staff, or in aviation management. Travel the world.

courses.name: ITI (Industrial Training)
courses.description: Learn practical skills in electrical, mechanical, or technical trades. Quick employment.
